lineage.Viterbi

This file contains the methods for the Viterbi algorithm implemented in an a upward recursion.

Module Contents

Functions

get_leaf_deltas(tHMMobj)

Delta matrix and base case at the leaves.

get_nonleaf_deltas(tHMMobj, deltas, state_ptrs)

Calculates the delta values for all non-leaf cells by filling out the delta matrix passed to it from the get_leaf_deltas().

get_delta_parent_child_prod(lineage, delta_array, T, node_parent_m_idx)

Calculates the delta coefficient for every parent-child relationship of a given parent cell in a given state.

Viterbi(tHMMobj, deltas, state_ptrs)

Runs the viterbi algorithm and returns a list of arrays containing the optimal state of each cell.
lineage.Viterbi.get_leaf_deltas(tHMMobj)

Delta matrix and base case at the leaves. Each element in this N by K matrix is the probability for the leaves \(P(x_n = x | z_n = k)\).

Parameters

tHMMobj -- the tHMM object

Returns

a list of N by K matrices for each lineage, initialized from the leaf cells by EL(n,k).

Return type

Tuple[list, list]

lineage.Viterbi.get_nonleaf_deltas(tHMMobj, deltas, state_ptrs)

Calculates the delta values for all non-leaf cells by filling out the delta matrix passed to it from the get_leaf_deltas().

Parameters

  • tHMMobj -- the tHMM object

  • deltas (list) -- a list of N by K matrices for each lineage, initialized from the leaf cells by EL(n,k).

  • state_ptrs (list) -- a list of N by K matrices that are state pointers, to obtain nonleaf deltas.

lineage.Viterbi.get_delta_parent_child_prod(lineage, delta_array, T, node_parent_m_idx)

Calculates the delta coefficient for every parent-child relationship of a given parent cell in a given state.

Parameters

  • lineage (list) -- A list containing cells (which are objects with their own properties).

  • delta_array (numpy.ndarray) -- A N by K matrix containing the delta values that will be used in Viterbi.

  • T (numpy.ndarray) -- The K by K transition matrix.

  • node_parent_m_index -- The index of the parent to the currently-intended-cell.

  • node_parent_m_idx (int) --

Return delta_m_n_holder

A list to hold the factors in the product.

Return max_state_ptr

A list of tuples of daughter cell indexes and their state pointers.

Return type

Tuple[numpy.ndarray, list]

lineage.Viterbi.Viterbi(tHMMobj, deltas, state_ptrs)

Runs the viterbi algorithm and returns a list of arrays containing the optimal state of each cell. This function returns the most likely sequence of states for each lineage.

Parameters

  • tHMMobj -- a class object with properties of the lineages of cells

  • deltas (list) -- a list of N by K matrices containing the delta values for each lineage

  • state_ptrs (list) -- a list of tuples of daughter cell indexes and their state pointers

Returns

assigned states to each cell in all lineages

Return type

list
